explains: n. 业主；所有者；经营者
wordGroup: sole proprietor 独资企业；独资经营者

sentences.en: He exchanged a few words with the proprietor, an old acquaintance of his.
sentences.cn: 他跟一位业主，他的一位老相识交谈了几句。

sentences.en: The proprietor was a Greek with hairy arms.
sentences.cn: 这个老板娘是个希腊人，手臂上长满了汗毛。

sentences.en: Perhaps the proprietor should switch it off at lunchtime.
sentences.cn: 或许，店主应该在午餐时间将其关闭。
